Trade/Device Name(s): PREVU* Point of Care (POC) Skin Sterol Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PREVU* POC Skin Sterol Test for risk assessment of coronary heart disease based on skin cholesterol measurement
Indications for Use Summary: Used as part of risk assessment for coronary heart disease in persons with history of myocardial infarction or suspected significant multi-vessel coronary artery disease, in conjunction with clinical evaluation and other diagnostic measures
